DataHubIngestionSourceInfo.description: Info about a DataHub ingestion source

name.description: The display name of the ingestion source

type.description: The type of the source itself, e.g. mysql, bigquery, bigquery-usage. Should match the recipe.

platform.description: Data Platform URN associated with the source

schedule.description: The schedule on which the ingestion source is executed

config.description: Parameters associated with the Ingestion Source

source.description:
The source or origin of the Ingestion Source

Currently CLI and UI do not provide an explicit source.

DataHubIngestionSourceSchedule.description: The schedule associated with an ingestion source.

interval.description: A cron-formatted execution interval, as a cron string, e.g. * * * * *

timezone.description: Timezone in which the cron interval applies, e.g. America/Los Angeles

recipe.description: The JSON recipe to use for ingestion

version.description: The PyPI version of the datahub CLI to use when executing a recipe

executorId.description: The id of the executor to use to execute the ingestion run

debugMode.description: Whether or not to run this ingestion source in debug mode

extraArgs.description: Extra arguments for the ingestion run.

type.description: The source type of the ingestion source
